checks.name: Subprocess Shell Injection
checks.description: Verify subprocess calls avoid shell=True where possible
checks.message: Subprocess calls reviewed for shell injection vulnerabilities

checks.name: File Permissions
checks.description: Ensure sensitive files have restrictive permissions (600/700)

checks.name: Secret Exposure
checks.description: Verify no hardcoded secrets in source code

checks.name: Input Validation
checks.description: Ensure user input is properly validated

checks.name: Path Traversal
checks.description: Verify file operations prevent directory traversal

checks.name: CORS Configuration
checks.description: Verify CORS headers are properly configured

checks.name: Rate Limiting
checks.description: Check API endpoints have rate limiting
checks.message: Rate limiting not required for static badge endpoints

checks.name: Error Handling
checks.description: Ensure errors don't leak sensitive information
checks.message: Error handling reviewed for information disclosure

checks.name: Logging Security
checks.description: Verify logs don't contain sensitive data
checks.message: Logging patterns reviewed for sensitive data exposure
